skills.name: OBLIVION
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Seal an enemy’s skill.
• Damage increases the higher the enemy’s MAX HP

skills.name: FURIOUS CHARGE
desc: • Gives Physical Charge to all allies.
• Grant an Extra Turn to up to 3 allies.
• Physical Charge doubles the damage of the next physical damage ability used.

skills.name: SHADOW
desc: Gain an extra turn when you kill an enemy.
